scripts.build: cargo build && npm run generate-ts && npm run build-ts
scripts.generate-ts: echo 'üß™ Running cargo test to generate TypeScript bindings...' && (cargo test --release 2>/dev/null || (echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Silent test failed, trying with output...' && cargo test --release -- --nocapture)) && echo 'üìã Copying TypeScript bindings...' && npm run copy-bindings
scripts.copy-bindings: mkdir -p bindings && (find target -name '*.ts' -path '*/debug/build/*' -exec cp {} bindings/ \; 2>/dev/null || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  No TypeScript bindings found in target directory') && ls bindings/*.ts >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  No binding files copied'
scripts.clean: cargo clean && rm -rf dist/ bindings/ node_modules/
